body: If you're reading this, congrats, you have been freed from the curse, however you need to repost this comment to 2 other manga for its full effects.

It says NTR on the title page, but def feels more cheating than NTR, the husband seems like he’s being depicted as cold and uninterested. So we’re not being meant to sympathize with him I think? Can’t tell unless we can read it.
This is most def NTR/Cheating.  Shitty uploaders man, lazy as fuck.  No tags.
I was just checking the art, but i got kind of interested. Maybe this is just part 1 but it looked more like cheating to me. Kind of wondering what the conversations with the husband were ?
